name: Trekking
description: Explore the majestic trails of the Himalayas and other scenic landscapes on foot.

name: Mountaineering
description: Challenge yourself with technical climbing on some of the world's highest peaks.

name: Adventure Sports
description: Get your adrenaline pumping with activities like paragliding, bungee jumping, and rafting.

name: Jungle Safari
description: Explore rich wildlife in national parks, identifying rhinos, tigers, and exotic birds.

name: Cultural Tours
description: Immerse yourself in rich heritage, visiting ancient temples, traditional villages, and UNESCO sites.

name: Pilgrimage
description: Embark on spiritual journeys to sacred sites, temples, and monasteries.

name: Meditation & Healing
description: Find inner peace and rejuvenation through yoga, meditation, and traditional healing practices.

name: Volunteering
description: Make a meaningful impact by participating in community development and conservation projects.

name: City Tours
description: Explore modern cities, urban attractions, shopping districts, and cultural landmarks.

name: Luxury Experiences
description: Indulge in premium experiences with 5-star accommodations, private tours, and fine dining.

name: Desert Safari
description: Experience the thrill of dune bashing, camel riding, and desert camping.

name: Hiking
description: Enjoy shorter, scenic walks through hills, forests, and countryside.

name: Rafting & Kayaking
description: Navigate through white water rapids on thrilling river expeditions.

name: Paragliding
description: Soar through the skies and enjoy panoramic aerial views of mountains and lakes.

name: Bungee Jumping
description: Experience the ultimate free-fall from suspension bridges or high platforms.

name: Mountain Biking
description: Ride through rugged terrains, single tracks, and scenic mountain trails.

name: Bird Watching
description: Witness diverse bird species in their natural habitats across forests and wetlands.

name: Culinary Tours
description: Taste and learn about local cuisines, spices, and cooking traditions.

name: Photography Tours
description: Capture stunning landscapes, wildlife, and culture with guided photography trips.

name: Helicopter Tours
description: Experience breathtaking aerial views of mountain ranges and remote locations.

name: Yoga Retreats
description: Focus on wellness and mindfulness with dedicated yoga sessions in serene locations.

name: Honeymoon Packages
description: Romantic getaways designed for couples seeking privacy and beautiful settings.

name: Family Holidays
description: Fun and safe travel experiences suitable for family members of all ages.

name: Educational Tours
description: Learning-focused trips for students and groups to explore history, science, and culture.

name: MICE
description: Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions for corporate groups.

name: Cruise Holidays
description: Relaxing journeys on luxury cruise ships exploring coastal regions.

name: Beach Holidays
description: Relax on pristine sandy beaches and enjoy water activities by the sea.

name: Skiing & Snowboarding
description: Enjoy winter sports on snow-covered slopes and mountain resorts.

name: Camping
description: Stay close to nature with overnight camping experiences under the stars.

name: Ecotourism
description: Sustainable travel focused on conserving the environment and improving local well-being.
